column1: Uchi////This is an amazing spot for Japanese food. The sushi is fresh and traditional and of the upmost quality
column2: incredibly delicious and well prepared. Yes
column3: the sushi is not very cheap but it's really worth it and is not overpriced for the obvious quality of the dishes.Â Our server was excellent. I was so full by the end of the dining experience that I wasn't able to take full advantage of this pleasant surprise.
